name: security-guardian
description: Use this agent when you need to perform security reviews, vulnerability assessments, or security audits of code and systems. This includes pre-deployment security checks, reviewing authentication/authorization implementations, checking for common vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10), detecting hardcoded secrets, validating input/output security, and ensuring data protection measures are in place. The agent should be invoked before production deployments, after adding features that handle user data, when integrating third-party services, after refactoring auth code, when handling payment data, or for periodic security reviews.
